T02D3128:230a-3: bsrung ba lnga'i mchod pa'i cho ga //
T02D3128:230a-4: bcom ldan 'das ma so sor 'brang ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3128:230a-5: aom a'a: dpal ldan rdo rje zhes pa la sogs
T02D3128:230a-6: pa ni gnod sbyin sha za srin po'i chogs kyis
T02D3128:230a-7: skrag par byed cing brnag dka'i 'jigs pa rnams dang
T02D3128:230a-8: / lo nyes nyes 'tshe nad dang chu srin rnams kyis mnan pa'i 'gro ba 'di gzigs nas //
T02D3128:230a-9: brtser ldan thams cad mkhyen pa yis ni so sor 'brang ma rtag tu byung ba yin //
T02D3128:230a-10: bcom ldan 'das mi mchog gi dbang phyug don kun phun tshogs mdzad ma de la 'dur //
T02D3128:230a-12: sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarba dharm'a: sva bh'a ba shuddhonyham /
T02D3128:230a-13: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konyham /
T02D3128:230a-14: sems can thams cad nye bar gzung ba'i slad du
T02D3128:230a-15: bdag nyid so sor 'brang ma'i gzugs su bsgom par
T02D3128:230a-16: bya ste / lag pa g-yas su a'am yig gis
T02D3128:230a-17: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang lag pa g-yon par a'a
T02D3128:230a-18: yig gis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D3128:230a-19: lag pa'i dung dag la h'um yig gis rdo rje rtse lnga par rnam par bsgoms nas /
T02D3128:230a-20: bad skor gyis dung byin gyis brlab bo //
T02D3128:230a-21: aom ma ni dha ri badzra ni ma h'a pra ti sa re raksha raksha h'um h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230a-22: aom sarba bigh'am autp'a ra ya h'um /
T02D3128:230a-23: aom pushpe zhes pa la sogs pas me tog la sogs pa byin gyis brlab bo //
T02D3128:230a-24: aom aa k'a ro mu kham zhes ba la sogs pas gtor ma byin gyis brlab bo //
T02D3128:230a-25: aom a'a: h'um raksha raksha phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230a-26: aom sth'a nam me raksha h'um /
T02D3128:230a-27: aom yo ga me raksha h'um /
T02D3128:230a-28: aom a'atma nam me raksha h'um /
T02D3128:230a-29: de nas rang gi snying gar aa yig gis zla
T02D3128:230a-30: ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du pram gyi yi ge
T02D3128:230a-31: bsams nas / de'i 'od zer gyis bla ma dang
T02D3128:230b-0: byang chub @230b sems dpa' la sogs pa snang bar
T02D3128:230b-1: bsams nas / byas shing / sems can gyi don byas shing /
T02D3128:230b-2: 'og min gyi gnas su song ste /
T02D3128:230b-3: so sor 'brang ma chen mo 'khor dang bcas pa
T02D3128:230b-4: mdun gyi nam mkha'i gnas su bltas shing dgug go
T02D3128:230b-12: aom a'a: h'i panytsa raksha yee pra ba ra satka r'a ya aargham pra t'itstsha h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230b-15: aom ma ni dha ri badzri ni ma h'a pra ti sa re h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230b-17: aom aa mri ta ba re bra ba ra bi shuddhe h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230b-19: aom aa mri t'a bi lo ki ni gnda sam
T02D3128:230b-20: raksha ni a'a karsha ni h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a
T02D3128:230b-22: aom bi ma le bi pu le dza ya ba
T02D3128:230b-23: re dza ya h'um ha ni ru ru tsa le
T02D3128:230b-26: aom bha ra bha ra sam bha ra sam bha
T02D3128:230b-27: ra aindri ya ba la bi sho dha ni h'um
T02D3128:230b-31: aom k'a l'i ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230b-33: aom k'a l'a ra tr'i ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230b-35: aom k'a ka karnn'i ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230b-37: aom shvi t'i ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230b-39: aom badzr'am ku sh'i ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230b-41: aom badzra p'a sh'i ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230b-43: aom badzra spho t'i ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230b-45: aom badzr'a be sh'i ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230b-47: aom gandha rbbe bhya: sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230b-49: / aom kumbha nde bhya: sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230b-51: aom n'a ge bhya: sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230b-55: aom me gho lk'a yee sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230b-56: aom sh'i t'am sha we sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230b-57: aom rakt'am ga ku m'a r'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230b-59: aom bho ga spa d'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230b-60: aom aa su ratta m'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230b-61: aom krishna warnna ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230b-62: aom aa mri ta pri y'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230b-63: aom dzye ti ke te pe sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230b-64: aom kritta k'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230b-65: aom ro hi n+ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230b-66: aom mri ga shi r'a yee sv'a 'a /
T02D3128:230b-68: aom pu na rba sa be sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230b-70: aom aa shle sh'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230b-71: aom ma gh'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230b-72: aom p'urba pha lgu n+yee sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230b-73: aom autta ra pha lgu n+yee sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230b-75: aom tsee tr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230b-76: aom sv'a ta ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230b-77: aom bi sh'a sh'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230b-78: aom aa nu ra dh'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230b-80: aom m'u l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230b-81: aom p'urb'a sh'a dh'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230b-82: aom aautta r'ash'a n'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230b-83: aom aa bhi dzi ta ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230b-84: aom shr'i ba n'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230b-85: aom dha ni shth'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:230b-86: aom sa ta bhish'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:231a-2: aom autta ra bha dr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:231a-3: aom re ba tyee sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:231a-4: aom aa shva n+yee sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:231a-5: aom bha ri n+yee sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:231a-7: aom ya m'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:231a-8: aom ba ru n'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:231a-9: aom ku be r'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:231a-11: aom neerri ty'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:231a-12: aom b'a ya be sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:231a-13: aom ai sh'a n'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:231a-14: aom pra hma ne sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:231a-15: aom pri thi byee sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:231a-16: aom be ma tsi tri bhya: sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:231a-18: kun da dung dang zla mdog 'dra //
T02D3128:231a-19: rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid mchog / phun sum tshogs kun sbyin mdzad ma //
T02D3128:231a-21: kha dog gnag cing sgra chen mo //
T02D3128:231a-23: gdul dka'i 'byung po sdud par mdzad //
T02D3128:231a-24: khro mo'i rgyal la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02D3128:231a-25: lha mo ye shes che las byung //
T02D3128:231a-26: gser mdog gi ni 'od mdzad ma //
T02D3128:231a-27: lha mo chen mo rig sngags rgyal //
T02D3128:231a-28: rma bya la yang bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02D3128:231a-29: kha dog mdzes shing spyan rgyas pa //
T02D3128:231a-30: chu skyes kha bye bzhad pa mo //
T02D3128:231a-34: myos byed la brtson rnam par 'khor //
T02D3128:231a-35: k'a kordha ni gcod mdzad ma //
T02D3128:231a-36: lha mo'i gzugs can la phyag 'tshal //
T02D3128:231a-37: dbang med bdag gis mi dge bgyis pa dang //
T02D3128:231a-38: bgyid du stsal dang yi rang bgyis pa gang //
T02D3128:231a-39: de dag thams cad byang chub mchog gi ni //
T02D3128:231a-40: spyan sngar da ni so sor bshags par bgyi //
T02D3128:231a-41: ma lus 'gro ba'i don rnams sgrub mdzad pa //
T02D3128:231a-42: zab cing gting med bde gshegs sras rnams kyi //
T02D3128:231a-43: tshogs gnyis dang ni de las gzhan la yang ;
T02D3128:231a-44: / rtag tu bdag ni rjes su yi rang ngo //
T02D3128:231a-47: de ma thag tu byams pa dang snying rje dang
T02D3128:231a-48: dga' ba dang btang snyoms te tshangs pa'i gnas pa
T02D3128:231a-51: sarba dharm'a: sva bh'a ba shuddhonyham /
T02D3128:231a-52: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a b'atma konyham /
T02D3128:231a-53: de nas yam ram lam bam sum las gser gyi
T02D3128:231a-54: ri dang gling rgya mtshos 'khor yug tu yongs su
T02D3128:231a-55: bskor ba / ram yig gi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D3128:231a-56: de'i steng du h'um las skyes pa'i sna tshogs rdo
T02D3128:231a-57: rje las 'od zer 'phros pa las rdo rje'i sa
T02D3128:231a-58: gzhi dang rdo rje'i rab dang rdo rje'i gur dang
T02D3128:231b-0: rdo rje'i bla re @231b bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3128:231b-1: de'i steng du bhr'um yig gis gru bzhi pa sgo
T02D3128:231b-2: bzhi pa rta babs bzhis brgyan pa'i khangs pa brtsegs
T02D3128:231b-4: de'i dbus su bam yig las skyes pa'i sna tshogs chu skyes /
T02D3128:231b-5: de'i steng du zla ba'i gzugs brnyan /
T02D3128:231b-6: de'i steng du pram yig gi sa bon las skyes
T02D3128:231b-7: pa'i 'od zer las skyes pa'i 'khor lo dkar po
T02D3128:231b-8: rtsibs brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3128:231b-9: rang gi sa bon dang mtshan ma yongs su gyur
T02D3128:231b-10: pa las sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba la
T02D3128:231b-11: rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02D3128:231b-15: g-yon ljang gu / phyag brgyad pa /
T02D3128:231b-16: g-yas kyi phyag dang pos 'khor lo /
T02D3128:231b-19: bzhi pas ral gri / g-yon gyi dang pos sdigs mdzub dang rdo rje'i zhags pa /
T02D3128:231b-22: bzhi pas dgra sta bsnams pa /
T02D3128:231b-24: dbu la mchod rten gyis brgyan pa /
T02D3128:231b-25: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i so sor 'brang ma bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3128:231b-26: de'i shar du h'um yig sa bon las byung ba'i
T02D3128:231b-27: stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma sna tshogs chu
T02D3128:231b-28: skyes dang nyi ma la rol pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs
T02D3128:231b-30: skra ser skya gyen du brdzes pa /
T02D3128:231b-31: mi'i thod pa'i phreng ba phrag par 'phyang ba /
T02D3128:231b-36: mu tig gi do shal dang gdu bu ste sna tshogs pas brgyan pa /
T02D3128:231b-41: g-yon ljang gu / zhal so so la spyan gsum ma /
T02D3128:231b-43: g-yas kyi phyag dang pos mchog sbyin /
T02D3128:231b-46: bzhi pas ral gri / g-yon gyi phyag dang pos sdigs mdzub dang zhags pa /
T02D3128:231b-49: bzhi pas padma'i steng du rin po che cha drug pa bsnams pa /
T02D3128:231b-50: sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
T02D3128:231b-51: stobs chen mo pha rol gnon pa /
T02D3128:231b-52: drag mo'i cha byad du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3128:231b-53: lho ru sna tshogs padma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su /
T02D3128:231b-54: mam yig las byung ba'i rma bya chen mo ser mo /
T02D3128:232a-2: zhal so so la spyan gsum pa /
T02D3128:232a-7: g-yas kyi dang pos mchog sbyin /
T02D3128:232a-8: gnyis bas rin po che'i rgyun gyi bum pa /
T02D3128:232a-10: bzhi pas ral gri / g-yon gyi phyag dang pos snod kyi steng du dge slong /
T02D3128:232a-12: gsum pas bum pa'i steng du sna tshogs rdo rje /
T02D3128:232a-13: bzhi bas rin po'i rgyal mtshan bsnams pa /
T02D3128:232a-14: rin po che'i cod ban can /
T02D3128:232a-15: rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3128:232a-16: nub tu sna tshogs padma'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil
T02D3128:232a-17: 'khor gyi dbus su tram yig las byung ba'i gsang
T02D3128:232a-18: sngags rjes su 'brang ba chen mo dmar ba /
T02D3128:232a-20: zhal so so la spyan gsum ma /
T02D3128:232a-25: phyag dang po dag gis chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya byas pa /
T02D3128:232a-26: gnyis pa dag gis ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya /
T02D3128:232a-27: gsum pa dag gis mchog sbyin zhags pa 'dzin pa /
T02D3128:232a-28: bzhi pa dag gis mi 'jigs pa dang padmas mtshan pa'i bum pa 'dzin pa /
T02D3128:232a-29: lnga pa dag gis rdo rje dang rin po che 'dzin pa /
T02D3128:232a-30: drug pa dag gis mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa /
T02D3128:232a-31: sems dpa'i skyil krung rin po che'i cod pan can /
T02D3128:232a-32: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3128:232a-33: dar la bab ba'i lang tsho dang ldan pa /
T02D3128:232a-34: ngo shal dang gdu bus brgyan pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3128:232a-35: byang du sna tshogs padma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su /
T02D3128:232a-36: sham yig las byung ba'i bsil ba'i tshal chen mo ljang gu / zhal gsum ma /
T02D3128:232a-37: zhal so so la spyan gsum ma /
T02D3128:232a-38: rtsa ba'i zhal ljang gu / g-yas dkar mo /
T02D3128:232a-40: g-yas kyi phyag dang pos mi 'jigs pa /
T02D3128:232a-43: g-yon gyi phyag dang pos sdigs mdzub dang rdo rje zhags pa /
T02D3128:232a-46: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3128:232a-47: mer sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la nag mo gnag cing phyag dag gis dung 'dzin pa /
T02D3128:232b-0: bden bral du sna tshogs chu skyes dang @232b slab
T02D3128:232b-1: la dus mtshan ma ser mo phyag dag gis dgra
T02D3128:232b-2: sta 'dzin pa / rlung du sna tshogs chu skyes
T02D3128:232b-3: dang nyi ma la rna ba nag mo dmar ba
T02D3128:232b-4: sta 'dzin pa / / phyag dag gis rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa /
T02D3128:232b-5: dbang ldan du sna tshogs padma dang zla ba la dkar mo dkar ba /
T02D3128:232b-6: phyag dag gis rtse gsum 'dzin pa /
T02D3128:232b-7: bzhi po 'di rnams rdo rje'i skyil krung dang /
T02D3128:232b-8: rin po che'i cod pan can /
T02D3128:232b-10: dar la bab pa'i lang tsho dang ldan par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3128:232b-12: yig las byung ba'i rdo rje lcags kyu ma dkar mo phyag g-yas pa lcags kyu'i tshul /
T02D3128:232b-13: lhor h'um yig las byung ba'i rdo rje zhags pa
T02D3128:232b-14: ma ser mo phyag g-yas kyis zhags pa 'dzin pa
T02D3128:232b-15: / nub tu bam las byung ba'i rdo rje lcags
T02D3128:232b-16: sgrog ma dmar mo phyag g-yas rdo rje'i lcags sgrog
T02D3128:232b-17: / gis mtshan pa / byang du ho yig las
T02D3128:232b-18: byung ba'i rdo rje 'bebs ma sngo bsangs phyag g-yas
T02D3128:232b-19: kyis rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa /
T02D3128:232b-20: bzhi po 'di rnams sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma la rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02D3128:232b-22: ngar la bab ba'i lang tshos brgyan pa /
T02D3128:232b-23: rnam bar bkra ba'i rin po che'i rgyan can bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3128:232b-24: shar lus 'phags por lha yul ba'i rnam ba sna
T02D3128:232b-25: tshogs ba'i kha dog gi cha byad dang ldan pa'i
T02D3128:232b-27: 'dzam bu gling du srin po ltar snang zhing gcigs
T02D3128:232b-28: pa sna tshogs pa'i cha byad can gyi grul bum
T02D3128:232b-29: rnams so // nub ba lang spyod du gdengs kas
T02D3128:232b-30: mtshan pa'i mgo po sna tshogs pa'i cha byad can
T02D3128:232b-31: gyi rgyan 'dzin pa'i klu rnams so //
T02D3128:232b-32: byang sgra mi snyan du gnod sbyin gyi gzugs sna
T02D3128:232b-33: tshogs pa'i cha byad 'dzin ba'i lus ngan rnams bsgom
T02D3128:232b-34: par bya'o // de nas phyi rol du shar gyi
T02D3128:232b-35: phyogs su rta bdun ba'i shing rta la gnas pa'i
T02D3128:232b-36: nyi ma dmar po g-yas dang gzhan gyi phyag dag
T02D3128:232b-38: de'i g-yon du zla ba ngang pa la zhon pa
T02D3128:232b-39: g-yas dang gzhan gyi phyag dag gis ku mud 'dzin
T02D3128:232b-40: pa / mer mig dmar ra skyes la zhon pa g-yas gri katt'a ra /
T02D3128:232b-41: g-yon gyis mi'i mgo bo 'dzin pa /
T02D3128:232b-42: lho ru gza' lhag ser po padma la gnas pa mnga' dang gzhu 'dzin pa /
T02D3128:232b-43: bden bral du phur bu mdog dkar po glang po
T02D3128:232b-44: che la zhon ba phreng ba dang spyi blugs 'dzin
T02D3128:233a-0: pa / nub tu padma la pa bsangs dkar po phreng skud @233a * //
T02D3128:233a-2: rlung du rus sbal la spen pa nag po dbyug pa dang phreng ba 'dzin pa /
T02D3128:233a-3: byang du sgra gcan dmar nag nyi ma dang zla ba 'dzin pa /
T02D3128:233a-4: dbang ldan du mjug ring gang cing du ba'i mdog ral gri dang sprul zhags 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3128:233a-5: de nas phyi rol gyi khor yug la shar gyi
T02D3128:233a-6: phyogs su me thab kyi stan la gnas pa'i smin
T02D3128:233a-7: drug sngo bsangs / khyu mchog la zhon pa'i snar ma dkar mo /
T02D3128:233a-8: ri dags la zhon pa'i mgo nag mo /
T02D3128:233a-9: sprul chen la gnas pa'i lag ser mo /
T02D3128:233a-10: padma la gnas pa'i nab so ser mo /
T02D3128:233a-11: bum pa la gnas pa'i rgyal sngo bsangs bya rog gi stan la skag dkar mo /
T02D3128:233a-12: lho ru ma he'i stan la mchu gur kum lta bu /
T02D3128:233a-13: rdo'i stan la gre ljang gu / rdo'i stan la
T02D3128:233a-14: spo ljang gu / glang po che la zhon pa'i
T02D3128:233a-16: rma bya la gnas pa'i nag pa ljang gu / khyogs la zhon pa'i sa ri ser mo /
T02D3128:233a-17: lug la gnas pa'i sa ga nag mo ;
T02D3128:233a-18: nub tu ngang pa la gnas pa'i lha mtshams sngo bsangs /
T02D3128:233a-19: rus sbal la gnas pa'i snon ser mo /
T02D3128:233a-20: la phug la gnas pa'i snubs ser ma /
T02D3128:233a-21: stan nang tshangs can la gnas pa'i chu stod nag mo /
T02D3128:233a-22: shing shar la gnas pa'i chu smad dkar mo /
T02D3128:233a-23: seng ge'i stan la gro bzhin sngo bsangs /
T02D3128:233a-24: ro la gnas pa'i byi bzhin dkar mo /
T02D3128:233a-25: dom la gnas pa'i mon gru ser skya /
T02D3128:233a-26: sprin la gnas pa'i mon gre nag mo /
T02D3128:233a-27: ngang pa la gnas pa'i khrums stong ljang gu / glang la zhon pa'i khrums smad ser mo /
T02D3128:233a-28: 'khor lo la gnas pa'i nam gru ser skya /
T02D3128:233a-29: rta la zhon pa'i dbyu gu dkar mo /
T02D3128:233a-30: yi dags kyi stan la bra nye ljang gu ste /
T02D3128:233a-31: lha mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad po 'di rnams g-yo ba'i stod g-yogs gyon pa /
T02D3128:233a-32: thal mo sbyar ba dag tu bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3128:233a-33: de'i phyi rol 'khor yug gsum pa la shar du /
T02D3128:233a-34: sa srung dkar po la zhon pa'i dbang po rdo rje 'dzin pa /
T02D3128:233a-35: lho ru ma he la zhon pa'i gshin rje nag po dbyug pa 'dzin pa /
T02D3128:233a-36: nub tu chu srin la zhon pa'i chu lha dkar po gdengs ka bdun dang ldan pa /
T02D3128:233a-38: byang du mi la zhon pa'i ku be ra ser po lcags kyu dang be con 'dzin pa /
T02D3128:233b-0: mer ra skyes la zhon pa'i me lha dmar po blugs gzar dang spyi blugs @233b 'dzin pa /
T02D3128:233b-1: bden bral du ro la zhon pa'i srin po'i bdag po sngon po ral gri dang phub 'dzin pa /
T02D3128:233b-2: rlung du ri dags la zhon pa'i rlung lha sngon po rlung ras 'dzin pa /
T02D3128:233b-3: dbang ldan du khyu mchog la zhon pa'i dbang ldan dkar po /
T02D3128:233b-4: phyag na rtse gsum dang thod pa 'dzin pa /
T02D3128:233b-5: 'di'i g-yon logs su ngang pa la zhon pa'i tshangs
T02D3128:233b-6: pa ser po gdong bzhi pa phyag bzhi pa thal
T02D3128:233b-7: mo sbyar ba'i phyag dag gis bgrang phreng 'dzin zhing
T02D3128:233b-8: dbyug pa dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa /
T02D3128:233b-9: bden bral dang chu lha dag gi bar du nor
T02D3128:233b-10: 'dzin ma ser mo phyag na gser gyi bum pa
T02D3128:233b-11: / de'i g-yon logs su gshin rje'i bran mo sngo bsangs ral gri dang phub 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3128:233b-12: de nas yan lag dgod pa ni /
T02D3128:233b-13: aom a'a: h'um sa sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:233b-18: reg bya dag la dzrim ngo //
T02D3128:233b-19: de nas rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i 'od zer
T02D3128:233b-20: gyi 'od zer sna tshogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
T02D3128:233b-21: su spros te / des ye shes sems dpa' dang
T02D3128:233b-22: dam tshig sems dpa' lhan cig tu 'o ma dang
T02D3128:233b-23: chu ltar ro gcig tu gyur bar bltas nas /
T02D3128:233b-24: aabhi shinytsa tu m'am sarba ta th'a ga t'a zhes
T02D3128:233b-25: pas dbang bskur bar gsol ba gdab par bya zhing
T02D3128:233b-26: / ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D3128:233b-27: zhes pa la sogs pas chu'i dbang bskur bar bya'o ;
T02D3128:233b-28: / de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa bya ste /
T02D3128:233b-29: sangs rgyas thams cad skyed mdzad cing //
T02D3128:233b-30: sems can kun la phan mdzad ma //
T02D3128:233b-31: sems can kun gyi don bsgrub phyir //
T02D3128:233b-32: bsrung ba lnga la phyag bgyi'o //
T02D3128:233b-33: gang rnams tshim pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D3128:233b-34: sems can dge zhing rgyal bar mdzad //
T02D3128:233b-35: phun tshogs thams cad sbyin mdzad pa'i //
T02D3128:233b-36: gza' rnams dgu po khyod la 'dud //
T02D3128:233b-37: rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad po //
T02D3128:233b-38: phyogs rnams su ni bdun bdun gnas //
T02D3128:233b-39: nad kun nye bar zhi ba'i phyir //
T02D3128:233b-40: de rnams la ni gus phyag 'tshal //
T02D3128:233b-41: gang gi bsrung ba'i cho ga yis //
T02D3128:233b-42: sems can bde zhing rgyal bar mdzad//
T02D3128:233b-43: phyogs dang phyogs bral bzhugs pa yi //
T02D3128:233b-45: zhes pa ni rnal 'byor gnyis pa'o //
T02D3128:233b-46: de nas dpral ba dang mgrin pa dang snying ga
T02D3128:233b-47: rnams su dkar po dang dmar po dang nag po'i
T02D3128:233b-48: aom a'a: h'um gi yi ge nges par brtag par
T02D3128:234a-0: bya zhing / ji srid 'dod par bsgom @234a * //
T02D3128:234a-2: de nas snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis
T02D3128:234a-3: bkug pa'i dam tshig sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'i
T02D3128:234a-4: ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor mdun gyi nam mkha'i
T02D3128:234a-5: phyogs su bzhugs par bltas nas dgug pa la sogs
T02D3128:234a-6: pa ni sngar bzhin du bya'o zhes pa ni phra
T02D3128:234a-8: de'i rjes su bzlas pa bya ste /
T02D3128:234a-9: dgug pa la sogs pa can sngar bzhin du shes
T02D3128:234a-10: par bya'o zhes pa ni bzlas pa'i rnal 'byor ro
T02D3128:234a-11: // bhr'um las rin po che'i snod du kham yig las bza' ba la sogs pa /
T02D3128:234a-12: aom a'a: h'um gis byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D3128:234a-13: de rnams kyi 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D3128:234a-14: thams cad kyi ye shes bkug nas de nyid du
T02D3128:234a-16: de nas 'jig rten skyong ba rnams dgug pa'i phyag rgya bstan la /
T02D3128:234a-17: mchod yon la sogs pas mchod de /
T02D3128:234a-18: aom ma h'a pra ti sa r'a yee sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:234a-19: aom ma h'a s'a ha sra pra mardha n+yi sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:234a-20: aom ma h'a m'a y'u ryee sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:234a-21: aom ma h'a sh'i ta ba tyee sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:234a-22: aom ma h'a mantr'a nu s'a re n+ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3128:234a-23: sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po nyid //
T02D3128:234a-24: rig pa'i lha mo stobs chen mo //
T02D3128:234a-25: bdag gi khro gnyer can nyid dang //
T02D3128:234a-26: lha mo sgron ma de bzhin skyo //
T02D3128:234a-27: rdo rje lcags sgrog dkar mo gang //
T02D3128:234a-28: dkar mo chen mo de bzhin nyid //
T02D3128:234a-29: rdo rje nag mo pho nya mo //
T02D3128:234a-30: de bzhin rdo rje pho nya gzhan //
T02D3128:234a-31: zhags bzang rdo rje zhags pa ma //
T02D3128:234a-32: rdo rje zhags pa stobs chen mo //
T02D3128:234a-33: de bzhin nor can skal chen ma //
T02D3128:234a-35: me tog so ma nor bu'i gtsug / gser gyi skra ma ser skya ma //
T02D3128:234a-36: gzi brjid chen mo de bzhin du ;
T02D3128:234a-37: / nor can lha mo glog phreng ma //
T02D3128:234a-38: srin mo dang ni ral gcig ma //
T02D3128:234a-39: sangs rgyas zhing gi 'dren pa mo //
T02D3128:234a-40: thod pa can ma skal chen ma //
T02D3128:234a-41: de bzhin nor can lang ka'i dbang //
T02D3128:234a-42: gzhan yang sems can rjes 'dzin pa'i //
T02D3128:234a-43: rig ma mang po 'di lta ste //
T02D3128:234a-44: nag po gtsigs ma grul bum ma //
T02D3128:234a-45: dung can ma dang padma'i mtshan //
T02D3128:234a-46: 'phrog ma skra ljang dpal ldan ma //
T02D3128:234a-47: ser skya mo ni ljang gu ste //
T02D3128:234a-49: lha mo zhags nag bum lto ma //
T02D3128:234a-50: gshin rje'i pho nya gshin rje'i srin //
T02D3128:234a-52: gtor ma me tog bdug pa dri //
T02D3128:234b-0: sgron ma 'di @234b ni so sor bzhes //
T02D3128:234b-1: zhal zas dag kyang dbul bgyi zhing //
T02D3128:234b-2: dus kun du ni bsrung bar mdzod //
T02D3128:234b-3: rnam pa kun ni bdag dang ni //
T02D3128:234b-4: 'khor bcas ma lus sems can gyi //
T02D3128:234b-5: nye bar 'tshe nyid thams cad dang //
T02D3128:234b-6: 'jigs pa thams cad nyams par gyis //
T02D3128:234b-7: de bzhin rtag tu myur bar ni //
T02D3128:234b-9: lo brgya ru ni 'tsho gyur cig / rtag tu
T02D3128:234b-10: ston brgya mthong bar shog / rtag tu grub pa'i
T02D3128:234b-11: sngags kyi gzhi // bde legs dang ni gzhi tshugs gyur //
T02D3128:234b-13: ma rnyed ces pa la sogs pas bzod par gsol te gshegs su gsol bar bya'o /
T02D3128:234b-14: bsrung ba lnga'i mchod ba'i cho ga rdzogs so /
T02D3128:234b-16: // / rgya gar shar phyogs kyi pandi ta chen po /
T02D3128:234b-17: nags kyi rin chen gyi zhal snga nas dang /
